title: Abyssaria - Full Discography + Bonus tracks (Metal)
description:
Country of origin: Germany
Location: Dormagen, North Rhine-Westphalia
Status: Split-up
Formed in: 1998
Genre: Dark Metal
Lyrical themes: Darkness, Journeys, Mysticism
Last label: Unsigned/independent
Years active: 1998-2011


Atiscon	- Bass (1998-2000), Keyboards (2000-2001, 2007-2011)
Mephir - Vocals (1998-2004, 2007-2011)
Val Melkor - Guitars (rhythm) (2000-2011)
Irathor - Bass (2007-2011)
Benne - Guitars (lead) (2010-2011)
